name: Cropping Up
description:
This is a game made for Ludum Dare 41: Combine Two Incompatible Genres. We combined farming sims and tower defense. Credits:

MufinMcFlufin - Lead programmer, co-lead designer, AI architect

AugusteTheClown - Graphic artist, co-lead designer, UI/UX programmer

Lexeria - Musician, SFX artist, and a godsend
